title: Twitter targets its rival Substack, forcing well-known journalists to choose
description: Matt Taibbi, who Musk solicited to write the Twitter Files, says he’ll start using Substack’s new Twitter clone.

title: Friends remember CashApp founder’s zest for life, while mourning his death
description: Police have disclosed few details in the days since Bob Lee, 43, was fatally stabbed in San Francisco.

title: Six simple technologies that quietly make life better
description: Tech doesn't need to be fancy to make your life better.

title: Salary packages approached $1 million as Meta paid to play in metaverse
description: Programmers hired by the Facebook parent company Meta capable of building out virtual reality-powered games, apps and technology can earn total compensation from $600,000 to packages approaching $1 million, according to people familiar with the matter.
